Articles.Content:
So before trying out an insane rocket design with which I will try to complete 4 contracts at once, I saved the game by clicking esc and pressing "save game", and named it "before test". Then I tried to load this game, but it doesn't appear in the list. Other quick saves that I had made before I appear there, but this one doesn't. Is there a bug or am I doing something wrong?

Edited July 18, 2014 by guitarxe
Ok I figured it out - if I hit enter after typing the name it doesn't save. I have to click on the save button. I guess enter defaults to "cancel".
